  1. 04/06/2019 City Administrative Report

    The latest City Administrative Report is available to read online. 04/05/2019 City Administrative Report

  2. McCleary assumes role as Code Enforcement Officer

    Independence firefighter Mark McCleary has assumed the role of code enforcement officer for the City of Independence. Read on...

  3. March 2019 Sales Tax Report

    March receipts totaled $167,292, which is an INCREASE of $20,459 over March 2018, or up 13.9%. Please look at the Graph II, “March 1% Sales Tax 10 Year History” in the attached report. Read on...

/CivicAlerts.aspx
  1. Spotlight
  1.        

  1. A Word From The Mayor


    Welcome to the official website of the City of Independence, Kansas, the friendliest town in America.

    Independence is located in Montgomery County in the southeast corner of Kansas and has a population of 9,483. Independence has a strong industrial base with a "Hometown Atmosphere" and consider ourselves to be, in part, a rural community with many farming sites in the area surrounding the City. 

    Read More
